title: Ticket #6548: input files fetched using a filetransfer plugin are stored in SPOOL
description:
Reported by Lauren. Input files that are fetched using a filetransfer plugin are being stored in spool when a job is evicted, leading to filling up the SPOOL directory for jobs that are self-checkpointing.

I suppose the file should be re-fetched via plugin when restarting the job. That is a big enough change that this should go in devel, not stable. More investigation needed to fully understand the issue, but should be trivial to reproduce.
